name: s3
description: A simple connector to fetch data from S3 buckets
install_command: go build -o s3 pkg/connector/s3/s3.go && chmod +x s3

name: gdrive-adc
description: A simple connector to fetch data from Google Drive using gcloud ADC
install_command: go build -o gdrive pkg/connector/gdrive/gdrive.go && chmod +x gdrive
